ygData.subject: Illusions - Observations, needs conformation
ygData.msgSnippet: yes from everything that has been posted on the illusion spells you DO take on the special abilities of the illusion as you turn........so that goes for all
ygData.messageBody:
yes from everything that has been posted on the illusion spells you DO take
on the special abilities of the illusion as you turn........so that goes for
all races.....dark elf for ultravision.....troll illusion for faster regen
rate.....the woodelf idea was great for foraging, but not sure if it allows
you to use the races special SKILLS.....just actual abilities........such as
the Fire El hitting for 80 points......



Dreffan
